comments.comments_text: Glenn Murray (Brighton) meets a perfect cross from Martin Montoya deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike into the bottom left corner. The score is 0:1.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Dale Stephens (Brighton) was quite harsh and Lee Probert didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: The referee cannot ignore such behaviour. Shane Duffy (Brighton) sees a yellow card and needs to watch himself for the rest of the game.
